pages.body:
File-Sharing sites
=======

Here is a collection of various file-sharing sites found around ZeroNet. If you don't see one listed here please add it.


**Books :**
   * [AntiLibrary](/Antilibrary.bit/): Uses IFS to maintain book catalogs that are separated by languages.
   * [ZeroPub](/zeropub.bit/)

**Files :**
   * [BinChan's 0-Share](/1Dphm8Mth9WYN9fPm1yxj8Y4WhcKRhYXJJ/): Similar to ZeroUP.
   * [Intergalactic File Server](/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er): Uses IFS
   * [ZeroUP](/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/): File hosting with a file type and size restriction (10MB - 200MB) (popular)
   * [ZeroUP Unlimited](/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/): ZeroUP clone that allows files up to 1GB.

**Important Files :**
   * [Manually Maintained Directories](/15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a/)

**Magnet Links :**
   * [Box-HD](/BoxHD.bit): HD TV Series Box Sets delivered in a 'Play' style UI
   * [KickAssTorrent (KAT)](/1LBr1dHoXvJAMjDgW8Wcg5kbCoKyJnzo6p/): KAT in pre alpha version
   * [Play+](/1J3JSAxiM3uhpkp2dymY59yud8r2RGW6MA/)
   * [Play Anime](/1AnimePihDhcbVdK1nvnbSEtH4oKU8RAYG/): A wide selection of titles from the Anime genre.
   * [Play Movies](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/): A wide selection of titles of various classic genres
   * [TV Episodes](/tvepisodes.bit/): tvepisodes.bit is a weekly feed of TV episodes.
   * [ZeroTV](/1BEJbnufyav7TK23ADTs2Qi2UJeKSGDzw6/): Download TV Series. (Down/Empty)
   * [ZeroTV mirror](/1HwH4hfRhohJGVtZMBYprYKyHcuJNwL4sZ/)
   * [UA реліз](/1UkrrSpnJmuiig6r5v88Kn3isaR64Fbh3): advanced torrent index with search function
   * [_hot_buttered_toast_](/15wupQiQssL2PnJVZymRRHozeB3w2YfUzv/) searchable list of torrents including peer count
**Torrents :**
   * [Torrent Share](/1ShArE1dJFcHFgTEEAUMXksDZuRckzd3Y)
   * [ZeroTorrent](/192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3)

**Misc :**
   * [ZeroFun(LOL)](/1ZGagD38ypjSoUrpNEGaPFmAMKFcdud7C): upload image or video and share it
   * [The Snowden Files](/1DaXkbpBN7d9h78T5mjB2gTV9Ui46Bjwcv/)
   * [WikiLeaks Torrents](/1BXLnSBQrCamckJfJoTfyyvpYXTvWy6rts/html.zip/wikileaks_torrent.html)

**Music :**
   * [0music.bit](/1MusicXkuN2pk5hRdmroeyaCLDJtzTicpB/): Music file hosting. with a simple UI.
   * [MixTape](/mixtape.bit/): User published library that provides public & private playlists.
   * [ZeroLSTN](/1MQveQ3RPpimXX2wjW2geAGkNJ1GdXkvJ3/): Audio library with playlist functionality

**Texts :**
   * [NullPaste](/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/)

**Torrent Information & Censorship circumvention:**
   * [FOMO](/15qQZydzmaw6KpW8zWXz3XRmxQf4tQEqxX/): List of a torrent trackers and indexes
   * [unblocked.bit](/171amnchKeBrXnDVooTMKhHH9npTu1hRWj): Provides proxy access to clearnet file-sharing sites.

**Video :**
   * [Kopykate](/18Pfr2oswXvD352BbJvo59gZ3GbdbipSzh/): Most popular Youtube variant, official branch, support for large files, lots of content. ([development inactive](https://github.com/misses-robot/KopyKate-Big))
   * [Kopykate BIG](big.kopykate.bit/): Successor to Kopykate
   * [Kopykate webtorrent](/1aCq7GiJfUfGZ4GftjYaYbsEngPFzcxvN/): File size limit (DEPRECATED)
   * [KxoVid](/16KrKKRNHUc8WnRNuV9PgNqZQ8zqGteT4p): by Krixano, [development](/14hvki5Q7xMWtooUJTJV5RjQdMUwDkqCoF) stopped
   * [RU Video](/1videomkrGfLUNe2RaQJqbumb4nTgbp2J/): Video streaming site - clone of the KopyKate withRussian Content
   * [ShareTube](/1Share3xUeAF71KTqcvFyfDu516kNDETx/): Video streaming site - clone of the KopyKate with some improvements
   * [YouTube](/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/): Partialy porn oriented
   * [YouTube中文站](/1EdV58wumiWEXsncGsi213XpfaM43XX2dc/): 视频上传播放网╰(*°▽°*)╯哔哩哔哩。勿发色情(/▽＼)
   * see "Intergalactic File Server" above
